Articles.Content:
It has always really annoyed me that when i am blasting my engines in mapview, the sound tends to come 100% from the left or right speaker most of the times.

The ship is always centered in the camera so this thing makes no sense to me, and even if it did i would still love to be able to disable this.
Yes, I've noticed this as well and don't understand why it happens.

It's most problematic when you're rotated in such a way that you don't hear engine thrust at all so if you're in map view and you accidentally tap full throttle you might not even realize it.  Would be nice to add a mono option

Wierd that this does not seem to bother loads of players judging by the amount of reactions, when using desktop speakers i guess its not too bad but with headphones its pretty annoying.

It always makes me position my camera on the orbit in such a way that the sound is mostly centered.

Done!, very happy to say i managed to figure it out and create a mod for this.

Took me a lot of trial and error but that's what's being a kerbal is all about isn't it?

https://spacedock.info/mod/1702/Mapview Mono Sound
